Question
========
  
Researchers are interested in the relation between depression and personality disorders. Personality disorders are problematic traits and behaviors that exceed the usual range of individual differences. The researchers conducted interviews assessing personality disorders with adolescents who were psychiatric inpatients. Depression was measured using a questionnaire consisting of 11 questions. 


To measure the internal consistency of the depression questionnaire, Cronbach’s Alpha was calculated. 

![](uu-Cronbachs-alpha-017-en-tabel.JPG)

What is the influence of item dep5 on Cronbach’s Alpha?
  
Answerlist
----------
* It has a positive influence on alpha; this is caused by the item’s high mean.
* It has a negative influence on alpha; this is caused by the item’s Scale Mean if item deleted.
* It has a positive influence on alpha; this is indicated by the item’s Cronbach’s alpha if item deleted.
* It has a negative influence on alpha; this is caused by the item’s corrected item-total correlation.


Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* This answer is incorrect.
* This answer is incorrect.
* This answer is incorrect.
* This answer is correct.
